description:
Crafted with durable Cordura® ripstop nylon, this jacket is designed for colder adventures. Its PFC-free water repellent finish and 80g of recycled polyester insulation provide essential protection and warmth. The YKK® zipper ensures reliable functionality, while the adjustable hem allows for a customized fit. With zippered pockets and certifications, it's the perfect companion for outdoor exploration.

Lightweight and highly packable, this jacket effortlessly fits into your backpack, always ready for your next adventure. Its exceptional versatility and insulation make it a go-to choice for unpredictable weather conditions. Upgrade your outdoor gear with our Lightweight Insulated Jacket and embrace the freedom of year-round exploration.
name: Hooke Lightweight Insulated Jacket - Mens

specs.value: Made of lightweight and durable 1.8 oz CORDURA® ripstop nylon
